meanings.definition: In a manner that kills fungi.
meanings.sent1: The farmer sprayed the crops fungicidally to protect them from mold.
meanings.sent2: She applied the solution fungicidally to the affected area to stop the spread of the fungus.
meanings.sent3: The mushrooms in the garden were so scared of being sprayed fungicidally that they started wearing tiny raincoats.
meanings.sent4: The fungicidally treated soil became a graveyard for any fungi foolish enough to grow there.
meanings.sent5: The fungicidally sprayed plants stood tall and proud, free from the grasp of fungal invaders.

meanings.definition: Relating to the killing of fungi.
meanings.sent1: The fungicidally treated soil showed a significant reduction in fungal growth.
meanings.sent2: The scientist conducted experiments to test the effectiveness of various fungicidally active compounds.
meanings.sent3: The party in the petri dish was a hit, with all the fungi dressed in their best fungicidally themed costumes.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was as fungicidally effective at killing his bad mood as any chemical treatment.
meanings.sent5: The fungicidally resistant strain of fungus proved to be a formidable opponent in the battle for plant health.
